Calculate the area of the reclassified raster

Source: R/ENMreclass_area.R
ENMreclass_area.Rd

计算重分类栅格面积.

Usage

ENMreclass_area(
  reclassdir,
  crs,
  prefix = NULL,
  suffix,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  outdir = NULL
)

Arguments

reclassdir

重分类栅格所在文件夹路径, 不包括物种名.

crs

给缺乏投影的栅格定义投影. 例如"epsg:4326". 栅格的投影应与环境变量保持一致, 错误的投影会得到错误的结果.

prefix

字符型. 要重分类的栅格文件名的前缀, 用于筛选栅格.

suffix

字符型. 要重分类的栅格文件名的后缀, 用于筛选栅格.

overwrite

logical. If TRUE, filename is overwritten.

outdir

输出文件夹路径.

Value

列表. reclass_area_path为计算的面积文件存储路径; area为重分类后的面积(单位KM²).

Examples

ENMreclass_area(
  reclassdir = "/ifs1/User/wuhaiyang/sdm/reclass25部分",
  crs = "epsg:4326",
  prefix = "wz0001",
  suffix = "tif",
  outdir = "/ifs1/User/wuhaiyang/sdm"
)
#> Error in ENMreclass_area(reclassdir = "/ifs1/User/wuhaiyang/sdm/reclass25部分",     crs = "epsg:4326", prefix = "wz0001", suffix = "tif", outdir = "/ifs1/User/wuhaiyang/sdm"): reclassdir not find.
